name: deimosrising
text: Chinese women man. Dang.

name: lawdog
text: Chinese otter women.  Amen.

name: el_connor
text:
I'd shorten it to

"Women"

name: deus
text: W00ters!

name: overmedicated
text: Accounts for the overpopulation problem, I suppose.

name: jhunt
text: That is the best Philippe can do.  Man, I don't even know what to say about that.  Does he have game?  I guess the proof is in the pudding.

name: fosters
text: Yeah I can't even begin to guess what he was trying to communicate with that, but damn did it ever work.

name: madnes
text: A comment left by madnes was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by wharfrat, Overmedicated, Thorfinn, hikikomori, lateadopter, Epicurus, Doc_Rostov, I_Love_Kate, dj)

name: fuckyoufriday
text: HEY-O!

name: thorfinn
text: Had you said "Ultra Peanut", you probably would've received double the chubbies and half the lames. You still would've gotten a few lames, however, from the people who would have to remind you that [color=red] PHILIPPE IS FIVE!!![/color]

name: thorfinn
text: apparently assetbar doesn't allow BBCode color modification

name: semiquaver
text: Assetbar is shit

name: puguglypress
text: It's funnier that the comment was so [bold]EMPHASIZED[/endbold] by the faulty BBCode

name: fuckyoufriday
text: A comment left by fuckyoufriday was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by wharfrat, FuckYou, cognitonaut)

name: everything_is_a_hat
text: I love how Philippe closes his eyes tightly in fear as Super Peanut hands him the paper.

name: deancain29
text: Philippe gonna get his bone on...

name: hollis
text: I know, what's up with that?  It's one of the few strips where I find a lack of continuity.

name: riazm
text: Well a five year old otter is probably pretty mature, how old is five in human years?

name: kelsotimebomb
text:
Apparently, otters reach sexual maturity somewhere around 3-5 years of age.

So yeah, gettin' his bone one.

name: tekende
text: Maybe, but Philippe is a stuffed animal, not a real otter, so...

name: jamzz
text: yeah, no need to be all gettin our biology on here%u2026

name: salvar
text: If we were getting our biology on, we would have already noted that Phillipe's bone, being an otter bone, would have an actual bone in it.

name: salvar
text: If we were getting our biology on, we would have already noted that Phillipe's bone, being an otter bone, would have an actual bone in it.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: "how old is five in human years?" i believe that would be five.

name: wharfrat
text: what a mysterous women

name: closefriend
text: I like Panel 5's slight breakage of the fourth wall. Philippe needs us to tell Ultra Peanut that if she's going to swear, use kid swears and not the hard stuff.

name: kickstart
text: subtlety, thy name is closefriend.  nice pickup =)

name: landowmpg
text: Another subtle touch is Ultra Peanut's little tongue poking out in concentration as she draws.  I do this, but produce asymmetrical stickmen.

name: wiliamthepleasr
text: Doubly subtle is that her tongue switches sides.  This shows extra concentration.

name: spectre
text: Alt text: "Hope Springs Eternal"

name: spectre
text: She draws a dog and off come the clothes. We've ALL been there, Phillipe, welcome to manhood.

name: caseyb3
text: Dad?

name: bhlaab
text: panel 5 is some charlie brown shit

name: pa_ass_nts
text: Where are the mickey mouse ears from? Hammerspace?

name: pyro_ike
text: I love Phillipe's blank stare in panel 9.  He doesn't even know what the fuck.

name: jalhalla42
text: I was lied to. Vlad the Make-Out King was not in this strip.

name: jujubeesforjesus
text: Perhaps this is what Phillipe looks like in 3 dimensions, and that is a portrait of him in his mickey mouse ears?

name: hifihero
text: I always read it as an early Disney style drawing of Phillipe wearing the ears. Onstad obviously has a taste for kitschy historicals, and Ultra Peanut's drawing is totally in the early 20s Disney style.

name: i_love_kate
text: I never got the impression from this strip that Ultra Peanut took her clothes off. Look at how they're distributed across the floor. No, she's just been vaporised by a Martian laser beam while Phillipe was distracted.

name: gmm
text:
"Dad, what's love?"
"Love is what it feels like when you've put on a hat specially for a girl but you're expecting her to just write some more swears at you but instead she draws a really good cartoon dog and takes off all her clothes"

name: tekende
text:
Someday, perhaps I will go to a bar in pants, a tie, and a Mickey Mouse hat. I will espy an attractive female and go up to her.

"Look, this is the best I can do. Do you like this?" I will say to her. "Do you understand this hat?"

After that, the possibilities for the rest of the evening are quite limitless. Perhaps I will even get to meet a real live police officer!

name: cleanfatback
text:
ahahhhahahaha

ahahahhaa

phooh
wow

name: belgand
text:
When that lady starts to remove her clothes in recognition. When she truly understands the hat. That is when your quest will be at an end.

Go now and return not until you have found your Achelady.

name: origotoshi
text: That would actually be funnier if you got it right, and the "Do you understand this hat" line was "Does this make any sense to you?".

name: radarjammer
text:
GO PHILLIPE


(SHE TOTALLY WANTS YOU)

name: paby
text: Look how tiny his thumbs are in the 8th panel.

name: 21echoes
text: The first 3 panels make this strip one of the best ever

name: kikineko
text: Take advantage of this situation, Philippe!
